Scripts.OnLoad: self.transmogType = LE_TRANSMOG_TYPE_APPEARANCE;
self.transmogType = LE_TRANSMOG_TYPE_ILLUSION;
self.AnimFrame.Anim:Play();
self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel() + 15);
Mixin(self.UndoIcon, SetShownMixin);

Scripts.OnClick: -- same as a right-click on the parent WardrobeTransmogButton_OnClick(self:GetParent(), "RightButton");

Scripts.OnLoad: self.Arrow.Glow:ClearAllPoints(); self.Arrow.Glow:SetPoint("CENTER", self.Arrow.Arrow, "CENTER", 0, -4);
Model_OnLoad(self, MODELFRAME_MAX_PLAYER_ZOOM, 0, 0); self:SetPosition(0, 0, 0);
WardrobeTransmogTokenFrameText:SetPoint("LEFT", WardrobeTransmogTokenFrame, "LEFT");
